00074     typedef struct tTransMatrix {
00075       std::string name;
00076       double** matrix;
00077 
00078       tTransMatrix() : name(), matrix(NULL) {}
00079       tTransMatrix(const tTransMatrix& o) : name(o.name), matrix(o.matrix) {}
00080       tTransMatrix& operator=(const tTransMatrix& o) {
00081         name   = o.name;
00082         matrix = o.matrix;
00083         return *this;
00084       }
00085     }TransMatrix;
00086 
00088     typedef std::vector<TransMatrix*> TransMatrixList;
00089 
00091     TransMatrixList matrixList;
00092 
00094     typedef struct tAreaBound {
00095       Coord low;
00096       Coord high;
00097 
00098       tAreaBound() : low(), high() {}
00099     }AreaBound;
00100 
00102     typedef struct tAreaType {
00103       std::string name;
00104         std::vector<AreaBound*> boundries;
00105 
00106         tAreaType() : name(), boundries() {}
00107     }AreaType;
00108 
00110     typedef std::vector<AreaType*> AreaTypeList;
00111 
00113     AreaTypeList areaTypeList;
00114 
00116     typedef struct tTimeBound {
00117     simtime_t low;
00118     simtime_t high;
00119 
00120     tTimeBound() : low(), high() {}
00121     }TimeBound;
00122 
00124     typedef struct tTimeDomainType {
00125         std::string name;
00126         std::vector<TimeBound*> boundries;
00127 
00128         tTimeDomainType() : name(), boundries() {}
00129     }TimeDomainType;
00130 
00132     typedef std::vector<TimeDomainType*> TimeDomainList;
00133 
00135     TimeDomainList timeDomainList;
00136

00139         int timeID;

00141         int matrixID;
